verses.verse: In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall this song <S%H7892><s%> be sung <S%H7891><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>; We have a strong <S%H5797><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>; salvation <S%H3444><s%> will God appoint <S%H7896><s%> for walls <S%H2346><s%> and bulwarks <S%H2426><s%>.
Open <S%H6605><s%> ye the gates <S%H8179><s%>, that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> which keepeth <S%H8104><s%> the truth <S%H529><s%> may enter in <S%H935><s%>.
Thou wilt keep <S%H5341><s%> him in perfect <S%H7965><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>, whose mind <S%H3336><s%> is stayed <S%H5564><s%> on thee: because he trusteth <S%H982><s%> in thee.
Trust <S%H982><s%> ye in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>: for in the LORD <S%H3050><s%> JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> is everlasting <S%H5769><s%> strength <S%H6697><s%>:

¶ For he bringeth down <S%H7817><s%> them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>; the lofty <S%H7682><s%> city <S%H7151><s%>, he layeth it low <S%H8213><s%>; he layeth it low <S%H8213><s%>, even to the ground <S%H776><s%>; he bringeth <S%H5060><s%> it even to the dust <S%H6083><s%>.
The foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread it down <S%H7429><s%>, even the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%>, and the steps <S%H6471><s%> of the needy <S%H1800><s%>.
The way <S%H734><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> is uprightness <S%H4339><s%>: thou, most upright <S%H3477><s%>, dost weigh <S%H6424><s%> the path <S%H4570><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%>.

Yea, in the way <S%H734><s%> of thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, have we waited <S%H6960><s%> for thee; the desire <S%H8378><s%> of our soul <S%H5315><s%> is to thy name <S%H8034><s%>, and to the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of thee.

With my soul <S%H5315><s%> have I desired <S%H183><s%> thee in the night <S%H3915><s%>; yea, with my spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me will I seek thee early <S%H7836><s%>: for when thy judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in the earth <S%H776><s%>, the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> will learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>.

Let favour be shewed <S%H2603><s%> to the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, yet will he not <S%H1077><s%> learn <S%H3925><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: in the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness <S%H5229><s%> will he deal unjustly <S%H5765><s%>, and will not <S%H1077><s%> behold <S%H7200><s%> the majesty <S%H1348><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when thy hand <S%H3027><s%> is lifted up <S%H7311><s%>, they will not see <S%H2372><s%>: but they shall see <S%H2372><s%>, and be ashamed <S%H954><s%> for their envy <S%H7068><s%> at the people <S%H5971><s%>; yea, the fire <S%H784><s%> of thine enemies <S%H6862><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> them.
¶ LORD <S%H3068><s%>, thou wilt ordain <S%H8239><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> for us: for thou also hast wrought <S%H6466><s%> all our works <S%H4639><s%> in us.

O LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, other lords <S%H113><s%> beside <S%H2108><s%> thee have had dominion <S%H1166><s%> over us: but by thee only will we make mention <S%H2142><s%> of thy name <S%H8034><s%>.

They are dead <S%H4191><s%>, they shall not live <S%H2421><s%>; they are deceased <S%H7496><s%>, they shall not rise <S%H6965><s%>: therefore hast thou visited <S%H6485><s%> and destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, and made all their memory <S%H2143><s%> to perish <S%H6><s%>.

Thou hast increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, thou hast increased <S%H3254><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%>: thou art glorified <S%H3513><s%>: thou hadst removed it far <S%H7368><s%> unto all the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
LORD <S%H3068><s%>, in trouble <S%H6862><s%> have they visited <S%H6485><s%> thee, they poured out <S%H6694><s%> a prayer <S%H3908><s%> when thy chastening <S%H4148><s%> was upon them.

Like <S%H3644><s%> as a woman with child <S%H2030><s%>, that draweth near <S%H7126><s%> the time of her delivery <S%H3205><s%>, is in pain <S%H2342><s%>, and crieth out <S%H2199><s%> in her pangs <S%H2256><s%>; so have we been in thy sight <S%H6440><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

We have been with child <S%H2029><s%>, we have been in pain <S%H2342><s%>, we have as it were <S%H3644><s%> brought forth <S%H3205><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%>; we have not wrought <S%H6213><s%> any deliverance <S%H3444><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>; neither <S%H1077><s%> have the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%>.

Thy dead <S%H4191><s%> men shall live <S%H2421><s%>, together with my dead body <S%H5038><s%> shall they arise <S%H6965><s%>. Awake <S%H6974><s%> and sing <S%H7442><s%>, ye that dwell <S%H7931><s%> in dust <S%H6083><s%>: for thy dew <S%H2919><s%> is as the dew <S%H2919><s%> of herbs <S%H219><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall cast out <S%H5307><s%> the dead <S%H7496><s%>.

¶ Come <S%H3212><s%>, my people <S%H5971><s%>, enter <S%H935><s%> thou into thy chambers <S%H2315><s%>, and shut <S%H5462><s%> thy doors <S%H1817><s%> about thee: hide <S%H2247><s%> thyself as it were for a little <S%H4592><s%> moment <S%H7281><s%>, until the indignation <S%H2195><s%> be overpast <S%H5674><s%>.

For, behold, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> cometh out <S%H3318><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%> to punish <S%H6485><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: the earth <S%H776><s%> also shall disclose <S%H1540><s%> her blood <S%H1818><s%>, and shall no more cover <S%H3680><s%> her slain <S%H2026><s%>.
